physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Hemoglobin nadired at 6.6 g/dl, with undetectable haptoglobin.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Parasitemia 0.3% detected via peripheral blood smear.
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Positive peripheral blood smear for intra-erythrocytic inclusions consistent with Babesia microti.
Worsening hemolytic anemia with Babesia parasitemia of 0.3%; blood transfusion required.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: From a previously resolved status to worsening anemia and parasitemia.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: No blood smear or PCR evidence of Babesia microti infection; IgG and IgM remained negative.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient improved with resolution of infection after treatment.
